div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 2, 1897. NEW POLISH WEEKLY PUBLISHED

body.p: The first number of the Narod (The Nation), official organ of the Polish Roman Catholic Union, made its appearance today. Judging by its general appearance, this number looks good. Its type, make-up, articles, etc., are of the best. We hope that success will favor it.
The editorial staff pledges to work for the good of the faith, the fatherland, and organization.
